event_registry_properties.name: action
event_registry_properties.item: Schedule a repair action to replace the affected Field Replaceable Unit (FRU), the identity of which can be determined using fmdump -v -u EVENT_ID. Please consult the detail section of the knowledge article for additional information.
event_registry_properties.name: description
event_registry_properties.item: An internal non-fatal uncorrectable error has been detected within the CPU chip.
event_registry_properties.name: details
event_registry_properties.item:
An internal non-fatal uncorrectable error has been detected within the CPU chip.

Nothing is deconfigured and no immediate action is taken.

Domain software could panic as a result of one of the following uncorrectable error traps:

   Uncorrectable error trap type 40 (TT=40)
   Uncorrectable error in a data field
   Domain may enter a RED state which may cause the domain to panic.


The recommended service action for this event is to schedule the replacement of the affected FRU's.

       LEGEND

      RED        = SUNW-MSG-ID
      BLUE     = EVENT_ID
      GREEN  = FRU


Step 1. Collect the fault message (use one of the following methods):


   Single-line fault message displayed on the XSCF console:

   Mar 20 21:04:32 san-ff2-21-0 fmd: SOURCE: sde, REV: 1.12, CSN: 7860000772  
   EVENT-ID: 45ca302c-a253-48db-861a-f8bf1330759b
   Refer to http://www.sun.com/msg/SCF-8000-RJ for detailed information.


   Complete fault message using 'fmdump -m' on the XSCF console:

   MSG-ID: SCF-8000-RJ, TYPE: Fault, VER: 1, SEVERITY: Major
   EVENT-TIME: Tue Mar 20 21:04:32 UTC 2007
   PLATFORM: SPARC-Enterprise, CSN: 7860000772, HOSTNAME: san-ff2-21-0
   SOURCE: sde, REV: 1.12
   EVENT-ID: 45ca302c-a253-48db-861a-f8bf1330759b
   DESC: An internal non-fatal uncorrectable error has been detected within the CPU chip.
   Refer to http://www.sun.com/msg/SCF-8000-RJ for more information.
   AUTO-RESPONSE: Nothing is deconfigured.
   IMPACT: The non-fatal uncorrectable error may cause the domain to panic.
   REC-ACTION: Schedule a repair action to replace the affected Field Replaceable Unit (FRU),
   the identity of which can be determined using fmdump -v -u EVENT_ID.
   Please consult the detail section of the knowledge article for additional information.


Step 2. Collect the output from the 'fmdump -v -u EVENT_ID' command
 

   SPARC Enterprise platform example:
 
   xscf> fmdump -v -u 45ca302c-a253-48db-861a-f8bf1330759b

         TIME                 UUID                                 MSG-ID
         Mar 20 21:04:32.8484 45ca302c-a253-48db-861a-f8bf1330759b SCF-8000-RJ
           66%  fault.chassis.SPARC-Enterprise.cpu.SPARC64-VI.se-tmo

                Problem in: hc:///chassis=0/cmu=0/cpu=0
                   Affects: hc:///chassis=0/cmu=0/cpu=0
                       FRU: hc://:product-id=SPARC-Enterprise:chassis-id=7860000772:
                            server-id=san-ff2-21-0:serial=PP06121471:
                            part=CA06761-D102 A0:revision=0101/component=/MBU_B/CPUM#0

           33%  fault.chassis.SPARC-Enterprise.cpu.SPARC64-VI.se-tmo

                Problem in: hc:///chassis=0/cmu=0
                   Affects: hc:///chassis=0/cmu=0/cpu=0
                       FRU: hc://:product-id=SPARC-Enterprise:chassis-id=7860000772:
                            server-id=san-ff2-21-0:
                            part=CA20393-B50X 001AA:revision=0101/component=/MBU_B



Step 3. Contact your Authorized Service Provider.



If you require additional information, please refer to InfoDoc #87402.
event_registry_properties.name: impact
event_registry_properties.item: The non-fatal uncorrectable error may cause the domain to panic.
event_registry_properties.name: response
title
event_registry_properties.item: Non-fatal uncorrectable error has been detected within the CPU chip.
